name: Shadow picker
description:
Iâ€™ll just use the default shadow. Said no one ever. 

Stunt & flex with these drop shadows instead, or tweak them to your liking. 
Just select a layer, pick a shadow size and your next Dribbble post will be a guaranteed success.

Tired of your clients/PO wanting your designs to "pop" a bit?

Say no more fam. Shadow picker got your back. You can easily inherit the current background color to your shadow to get a smooth blend.
